pa: And so, they told you you got the job,
vi: Cô đã được chúc mừng.

en: ama Mustafa'ya bakmanın şartları nedir söylenmedi.
pa: but you weren't informed about what it takes to look after Mustafa.

en: Ee… Evet. Özden Hanım, Asiyeler sana…

pa:
Asiye can't tell you about this.
 Only I can fill you in, my dear.

Asiye không có quyền cho cô biết.
 Chỉ tôi có quyền thôi.

pa:
From what he eats and drinks, to his hygiene
 and telling him when to shower.

It's all on you.
 It's like caring for a little boy.
vi:
tất cả.
 Như nó là trẻ con vậy.

pa: But you have to remember that he's an adult.
vi: Nhưng nó chỉ phần nào đó là trẻ con thôi.

en: Belki şimdi sen de öyle sanıyorsun.

pa: Even though Mustafa has the mind of a child, he's still…

pa: all grown up.
vi: của một người lớn.

pa: You understand this, right?

pa:
Um…
 Yeah, sure.

pa:
Good.
 Let's talk traditions.

en: Bizim örfümüzce senin ona bakabilmen için
pa: You'll have to become part of our family, that's our custom.

pa: Which means that in the presence of God,
vi: thì cô phải, có Chúa chứng giám,

pa: you'll need to be married to each other.
vi: lấy Mustafa.

pa: -Like, on paper? -Correct.
vi: - Lấy bác ấy ạ? - Ừ.

pa: The job is yours,
vi: Nhưng nếu cô bảo

pa: but only if you're willing to be part of our family,

pa:
and observe our traditions.
 We can't force you to do it.

pa: If you're not interested, fine.

Then we'll send you back.

and sail together.
 Come, come see.

vi: - Để tôi cầm cho. - Khỏi cần. Cảm ơn.

pa: Peyami, dear. Thank goodness you're here.

Mừng quá, con đến rồi. Dimitri đang không ổn.

What? Did something happen?

Có chuyện gì ạ, cô Lia?

Hm?
 Nothing.
 Hmm.

You sure?

vi: - Esvet. - Sao?

pa: She's gone.

pa: Seriously, I swear. Nothing happened.

pa: Nothing?

pa: Please believe me.

pa: I really can't take this.

pa: That's why I hurt.

pa: Peyami.
vi: Peyami.

That's why it's up to me.

I have to find her.

Tôi phải tìm được cô ấy.

How much time, Peyami?

Thời gian, Peyami?

pa: I love her!

I don't want to live without her.
 I have to find her.

Now she's all confused!
 I'll have to find her.

I just have to find her.

We gave our word to each other, Peyami.
 -Please, Peyami. Please, help-- -Dimitri!

That's all.

 If she hasn't returned,
 we'll search for her together if she doesn't show up.

I'm going to find her.
vi: Nhưng tôi sẽ thấy cô ấy.

pa: And when I find her…

Get married?
 -Your grandmother said…

…that if I wanted to stay here,

thì tôi phải lấy bác ấy.
 Tôi muốn ở lại lắm. Tôi muốn chăm bác ấy lắm, nhưng tôi không làm thế được.

Miss Firuze,

I apologize on her behalf.

Cảm ơn anh.

Here.

Đây.
 Cô vào đây mà thay đồ.

Me? But…

Tôi ấy ạ?
 Ừ.
